original: 與孫策總角之交，贊助其起事之軍資與兵力；孫權亦視為兄長、成就帝業的要因，待遇優於諸臣。
text: Accompanied by Sun Ce's chief officer, sponsored the military resources and strength of his uprising; Sun Quan was also regarded as the brother and the main reason for the success of the emperor, and the treatment was better than that of the ministers.
